title: Must Read: Apparel Manufacturing Hubs Are Open to Negotiation With Trump on Tariffs, Fendi and Kenzo Appoint New CEOs
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Monday. Apparel manufacturing hubs — including Vietnam, Indonesia, India and Cambodia — will not strike back against President Donald Trump's extreme tariffs set to go into effect on April 9. Instead, these countries are open to ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
